alert.note: Alert for Archer; Baylor; Foard; Hardeman; Knox; Wichita; Wilbarger (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued April 03 at 3:56AM CDT until April 03 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 10 PM CDT THIS EVENING FOR FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW HUMIDITY FOR WESTERN OKLAHOMA AND WESTERN NORTH TEXAS... ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH TUESDAY EVENING FOR STRONG WINDS AND LOW HUMIDITY FOR WESTERN OKLAHOMA AND WESTERN NORTH TEXAS... * TIMING...Afternoon and evening. * WINDS...Southwest 20 to 25 mph with gusts over 30 mph this afternoon. Southwest winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 55 mph Tuesday afternoon. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 5 to 10 percent each afternoon. * TEMPERATURES...Upper 80s to lower 90s on Monday. Mid 70s to upper 80s on Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Any fires that develop could spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is discouraged.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures will contribute to extreme fire behavior. A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are forecast to occur. Listen for later forecasts and possible Red Flag Warnings.
